channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 9 Last-Minute Deals on WIRED-Approved Gifts That Will Arrive In Time
item.description: These discounted tablets, headphones, and kitchen goods can still make it under the tree—if you hurry.

item.title: The Best TV Shows You Missed in 2024
item.description: Diarra from Detroit, The Pradeeps of Pittsburgh—these are the shows you might not have watched in 2024, but definitely still should.

item.title: Elon Musk’s xAI lands $6B in new cash to fuel AI ambitions
item.description: xAI, Elon Musk’s AI company, has raised $6 billion, according to a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday. Investors gave...

item.title: Hyundai is giving away free Tesla NACs adapters to its EV customers
item.description: Hyundai said on Monday that it would send customers who have bought or leased an EV before January 31 a free charging adapter that would let them acce...

item.title: Proton’s device aims to help those with kidney disease, and cut heart failure risks
item.description: People with chronic kidney disease, or those at risk of heart failure, are greatly affected by potassium imbalances in the body. These can even be lif...

item.title: How Google Maps Makes It Harder for Palestinians to Navigate the West Bank
item.description: One user told WIRED that Google Maps directed them to “drive right into a wall that’s been up since 2003.”

item.title: 30% off Samsung Promo Codes - January 2025
item.description: Enjoy the latest deals from Samsung, like 30% off phones, $100 off every time a friend uses your referral code, up to $2,700 off TVs, and more.

item.title: Halide’s next version will come with new film filters, HDR
item.description: Lux, which makes the iPhone camera app Halide, published a roadmap on Monday detailing the app’s next version, called Halide Mark III, to be released ...

item.title: OpenAI’s o3 suggests AI models are scaling in new ways — but so are the costs
item.description: Last month, AI founders and investors told TechCrunch that we’re now in the “second era of scaling laws,” noting how established methods of improving ...

item.title: People With Extreme Wealth Should Give It Away—or Be Penalized
item.description: The gap between the ultra-rich minority and the vast majority has never been greater. But a wave of activist millionaires is asking for higher taxes.
